title: DIOR Addict Lip Glow Oil
descriptions: It's enriched with cherry oil for a pampering formula. Featuring a minty-vanilla scent, it nurtures the lips with an immediate and lasting effect. With its Color Reviver technology, Lip Glow Oil reacts directly to the moisture level in each woman's lips for custom color while ensuring continual moisturization.

title: Diorshow Brow Styler
descriptions: It claims to be a product that helps in oil-water balance , that helps achieve a clear milky radiant skin with zero tightness and sooth sunburns.Also restore skin and dead cells

title: Dior Forever Natural Nude Foundation
descriptions: Fresh and lightweight, the texture of Dior Forever Natural Nude foundation achieves a natural and luminous finish with no mask-like effect, allowing the skin to breathe from morning to night. The complexion is flawlessly even for 24 hours non-stop. * The skin is hydrated*** and radiant, as if plumped.

title: Capture Youth Age-delay advanced creme
descriptions: . Concentrated in iris extract, this cream boosts the antioxidant power of the skin to defy visible signs of aging. A natural-origin plant mesh instantly helps to smooth, retexturize and strengthen the skin's surface.

title: DIOR Backstage Eyeshadow Palette
descriptions: An all-in-one eyeshadow and primer palette with one primer and eight blendable shades in matte and shimmer finishes. What Else You Need to Know: These all-in-one eye palettes have everything you need to prime, shade, and highlight for runway-ready eyes.r

title: Dior Prestige La Micro-Huile de Rose Advanced Serum
descriptions: The formula combines Rose de Granville flower and sap extracts and their 23 revitalizing micro-nutrients to help correct visible signs of aging. From the first application, filled with intense and deep nourishment, the skin is visibly plumped and seems replenished. In just 1 week, it appears firmer.

title: La Mousse OFF/ON Foaming Cleanser
descriptions: Its formula, composed of 90%* natural-origin ingredients, contains a double soap that targets a wide range of impurities. Its creamy and dense texture transforms into an airy and rich foam upon contact with the skin. After rinsing, the skin appears perfectly cleansed, pure and comfortable.

title: Hydrating creme, age-defying creme
descriptions: Discover the Dior moisturizer that meets the needs of your skin. Age-defying creme, hydrating creme for oily skin, combination skin or reactive skin.

title: Rosy Glow blush
descriptions: The iconic Rosy Glow blush is reinvented in a clean formula that blends seamlessly with the skin to flush the cheeks with an immediate healthy glow effect. Thanks to colour reviver technology, this powder blush reacts upon application with the skin's pH and moisture level for long-wearing

title: Miss Dior
descriptions: It is embroidered with fresh Lily-of-the-Valley notes, an apricot-tinged Peony accord, and powdery Iris notes. Miss Dior is thus built around an elegant, striking bouquet—like a “millefiori” that seems to carry countless flowers in endless colours. At the base, slight notes of tender wood envelop the composition.

title: 3CE Bare Cover Cushion
descriptions: Bare cover cushion sets thinly onto the skin like real skin and it shines naturally. It gives a natural bare glow finish like an innate glow. It sets in nicely like a primer with light and thin coverage. This non-irritating cushion gives comfort to the skin.

title: 3CE Face Blush
descriptions: With a soft touch and excellent blendability, the silky sliding texture naturally tinges your cheeks with colour. Sebum-controlling powders absorb sweet and sebum, allowing product to blend without clumping, imparting seamless colour that lasts all day long.

title: 3CE Back To Baby BB Cream
descriptions: 3CE Back To Baby BB Cream is a beauty balm cream that provides your skin with sun protection and coverage effortlessly. This 3CE BB Cream contains crystal water, diamond powder and pearl powder, that provides your skin with a healthy-looking glow naturally.

title: 3CE - Super Slim Waterproof Mascara
descriptions: This Super Slim Waterproof Mascara brings up every strand of eyelash and fixes curls for long hours. The waterproof formula highly resistant to water and oil keeps the makeup from smuging. Helps to create defined and clear eyelashes.

title: 3CE Multi Eye Color Palette
descriptions: A balanced set of 9 different warm shades for versatile and understated eye makeup looks. This palette creates a clean, translucent look without the heaviness of powder products, while its sebum control powders keep your eye makeup fresh without creasing.

title: 3CE Velvet Liquid Blusher
descriptions: 3CE Velvet Liquid Blusher tinges the cheeks with natural, clump-free color, imparting a soft and silky finish for a tasteful and elegant makeup look. #Like That - A pure apricot peach shade with a mature, classic vibe. How to Use : Dispense a small amount and gently apply.

title: 3CE Soft Matte Lipstick
descriptions: With a primer-like matte texture, this tug-free lipstick glides across lips and leaves vivid, seamless color behind. : Rich and sensual color payoff is guaranteed with a single swipe or two. : The creamy and blendable formula ensures an easy gradient lip for various makeup looks.

title: 3CE Multi Eye Colour Palette
descriptions: subtle and mature pinkish brown shades gracefully illuminate your eyes, while the deeper, richer shades create a powerful and alluring look. Product Features: Glittery Colour payoff.

title: 3CE's Makeup Fix Powder
descriptions: 3CE's Makeup Fix Powder with blurring effect absorbs excess sebum and conceals enlarged pores for a flawless finish. Formula contains macadamia seed oil to nourish and moisturize skin. The Fair version comes in a peachy ivory color to correct yellowish undertones.

title: 3CE Soft Matte Lipstick Clear Layer Edition
descriptions: With a primer-like matte texture, this tug-free lipstick glides across lips and leaves vivid, seamless color behind. : Rich and sensual color payoff is guaranteed with a single swipe or two. : The creamy and blendable formula ensures an easy gradient lip for various makeup looks.
